## test-environment package

A pure-JavaScript implementation of the [Lynx Spec](https://lynxjs.org/guide/spec.html)<!-- -->, notably the [Element PAPI](https://lynxjs.org/api/engine/element-api) and [Dual-threaded Model](https://lynxjs.org/guide/spec#dual-threaded-model) for use with Node.js.

## Classes

| Class                                    | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| ---------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [LynxEnv](./test-environment.lynxenv.md) | A pure-JavaScript implementation of the [Lynx Spec](https://lynxjs.org/guide/spec.html)<!-- -->, notably the [Element PAPI](https://lynxjs.org/api/engine/element-api) and [Dual-threaded Model](https://lynxjs.org/guide/spec#dual-threaded-model) for use with Node.js. |
